word:
Chap. 11 - A Victorious Life

Equipped for Victory
Put on the Whole Armor of God

     Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil. For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against the principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places. Ephesians 6:11, 12
